duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and lead project construction contract administration, ensuring quality assurance and control of Contract Documents.
Manage pre-construction meetings, review Contractor's project schedules, and provide input at construction meetings, OAC meetings, and job site reviews.
Provide technical expertise on construction details, evaluate change orders, and review pay applications for accuracy.
Coordinate architectural/interior staff and project consultants regarding drawing/specification changes during Bid and Construction Phases.
Issue ASIs, PRs, or CCDs as needed, review material testing reports, and coordinate the closeout process.
Provide mentoring and guidance to young professional architects, track project action items, budget, revisions, and responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Architecture/ Architectural Engineering, Construction Management or hands-on experience preferred. Healthcare experience a plus. Licensed Architect preferred.
